about_the_game:
Do you want to complete Boyfriend's Rescue getting the easier ways as well as tips to defeat all bosses and understand the social rule behind your sexual acts?



Don't forget, at the end of the level, every sexual act in Boyfriend's Rescue can make the game easier or harder!

This document contains all the detailed information you need to understand the whole game and how to unlock all achievements. To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Boyfriend's Rescue\Boyfriend's Rescue - Guide.pdf

content_descriptors.notes: Boyfriend's Rescue contains strong language, partial and full nudity, explicit male homosexual sex (oral and anal).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
